stimulusHtml: Which of the following is the best way for Congress to provide people with disabilities access to the airline industry in light of the Courtâ€™s ruling?

features.html: Congress passes a law requiring that all public accommodations provide access for people with disabilities. The United States Supreme Court rules that the law does not apply to the airline industry.

choicesHtml: Appeal the ruling to the United States Court of Appeals
Override the court with a two-thirds majority in both chambers
Pass a new law that specifies that the airlines must provide access for people with disabilities
Remove members of the Supreme Court who ruled against the law and have the president appoint new justices
